full_summary:
================

**NOTICE OF TENDER INVITATION**
================================

**Title:** Procurement of Mobile Work Trailers
----------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS3948745282

**Publication Date:** 17 August 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 26 September 2023, at 14:00 hours (EDT)

**Introduction:**
----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the purchase and delivery of mobile work trailers. On behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), PSPC invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal.

**Background:**
--------------

The CCG operates the Inshore Rescue Boat Student Program. This program requires specialized mobile work trailers for support operations. The procurement is a competitive process, open to all eligible suppliers.

**Specifications:**
----------------

* 3 mobile work trailers with the following specifications:
	+ Capable of withstanding harsh marine environments
	+ Equipped for various work environments
	+ Includes essential features for support operations
* The supplier may be requested to deliver an additional trailer in the future

**Option to Purchase Additional Trailer:**
------------------------------------------

The contract may be amended to include the purchase of an additional mobile work trailer, subject to agreement between the parties.

**Submissions and Contact Information:**
--------------------------------------

All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted electronically no later than 14:00 hours (EDT) on 26 September 2023. The complete proposal package should include the bid form, technical proposal, and all supporting documentation.

Eligible suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the [Ariba Discovery] (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15988428?extsite=MTU5ODg0MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) platform.

**Procurement and Selection Criteria:**
-----------------------------------------

The procurement is subject to open bidding (Competition - Open Bidding). The selection criteria will be based on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this RFP, please contact:

Kin Chow, PSPC/SPAC
Email: kin.chow@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Notes:**
------------------

* Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.
* The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the highest combined rating of Technical Merit and Price.
